description: The Monkey King, Sun Wukong and Pigsy are treasure hunters, who discovered that there is treasure buried under the school's building. They decided to role play as students to locate the treasure, but their strange behaviour attracts the attention of Teacher Tang and Headmaster Bull. Things are made even more complicated by the appearance of another treasure hunter, Cuicui, who entered the school with the same purpose.
name: Monkey King: Back to School
